players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a bold lie, Diana. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso."
Diana: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I have proof he is mafia. Bob, trust me and vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Diana is clearly lying. I investigated her last night and she's mafia. Bob, think logically - why would she wait to reveal until after I spoke unless she was fabricating a response?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
